name: Tractor Protector!
description:
Tractor Protector is a game made to support the people and country of Ukraine.

All money that is donated to this game will go directly to United 24.

-The Game-

The game is a small wave based, survival, roguelike game with a total of 20 tough waves where you the Ukrainian tractor must fight the Russian invading tanks! The game is reasonably difficult but we have not had much time to playtest so any comments are greatly appreciated.

-The Controls-

Keyboard or XBOX Controller

  • Forward = W / Right Trigger
  • Backward = S / Left Trigger
  • Left = A / Left Joystick
  • Right = D / Left Joystick
  • Fire = Spacebar / Right Bumper
  • Look Left = Left Arrow / Right Joystick
  • Look Right = Right Arrow / Right Joystick
  • Purchase Item = Left Mouse Button / A

We will have updates about this game and our other projects on our YouTube channel and out Instagram @soxoffsoftwearentertainment!

Have fun and Slava Ukraine!
